title: Pick up Apple's M4 MacBook Pro for $1,399 at Amazon with coupon
description: Month-end price cuts are in effect on Apple's latest MacBook Pro with an M4 chip, as Amazon's on-page coupon drops it to $1,399.99.Grab Apple's M4 MacBook Pro for $1,399 - Image credit: AppleThe $1,399.99 price at Amazon is thanks to a $150 instant rebate stacked with a $49.01 on-page coupon, bringing the total savings to $200 off MSRP. With the standard M4 model now including 16GB of unified memory compared to the M3's 8GB of RAM, the Late 2024 14-inch MacBook Pro offers additional value for the price.Buy for $1,399.99 Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: Month-end price cuts are in effect on Apple's latest MacBook Pro with an M4 chip, as Amazon's on-page coupon drops it to $1,399.99.
text: Month-end price cuts are in effect on Apple's latest MacBook Pro with an M4 chip, as Amazon's on-page coupon drops it to $1,399.99. The $1,399.99 price at Amazon is thanks to a $150 instant rebate stacked with a $49.01 on-page coupon, bringing the total savings to $200 off MSRP. With the standard M4 model now including 16GB of unified memory compared to the M3's 8GB of RAM, the Late 2024 14-inch MacBook Pro offers additional value for the price. Buy for $1,399.99 At press time, units are on backorder, but you'll want to order now to grab the deal and secure your place in line for the earliest ship date. You can compare this offer and discounts on every spec in our M4 MacBook Pro 14-inch Price Guide. Every M4 Pro and M4 Max model is also on sale at up to $300 off. Here are a few top picks from the MacBook Pro sale: 14-inch M4, 16GB, 512GB, Space Black: $1,399.99 at Amazon ($200 off) 14-inch M4, 16GB, 1TB, Space Black: $1,599 at B&H and at Amazon ($200 off) 14-inch M4, 24GB, 1TB, Space Black: $1,799 at B&H and at Amazon ($200 off) 14-inch M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB, 512GB: $1,749 ($250 off) at Amazon with on-page coupon 16-inch M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 24GB, 512GB: $2,249 ($250 off) at Amazon, B&H & Adorama
html:
Month-end price cuts are in effect on Apple's latest MacBook Pro with an M4 chip, as Amazon's on-page coupon drops it to $1,399.99.

The $1,399.99 price at Amazon is thanks to a $150 instant rebate stacked with a $49.01 on-page coupon, bringing the total savings to $200 off MSRP. With the standard M4 model now including 16GB of unified memory compared to the M3's 8GB of RAM, the Late 2024 14-inch MacBook Pro offers additional value for the price.

Buy for $1,399.99

At press time, units are on backorder, but you'll want to order now to grab the deal and secure your place in line for the earliest ship date. You can compare this offer and discounts on every spec in our M4 MacBook Pro 14-inch Price Guide.

Every M4 Pro and M4 Max model is also on sale at up to $300 off.

Here are a few top picks from the MacBook Pro sale:

  • 14-inch M4, 16GB, 512GB, Space Black: $1,399.99 at Amazon ($200 off)
  • 14-inch M4, 16GB, 1TB, Space Black: $1,599 at B&H and at Amazon ($200 off)
  • 14-inch M4, 24GB, 1TB, Space Black: $1,799 at B&H and at Amazon ($200 off)
  • 14-inch M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB, 512GB: $1,749 ($250 off) at Amazon with on-page coupon
  • 16-inch M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 24GB, 512GB: $2,249 ($250 off) at Amazon, B&H & Adorama
